entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 4 with temperature rising to minus 1 by morning. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Flurries beginning overnight. Risk of freezing drizzle this evening and after midnight. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 before morning. Low minus 4 with temperature rising to minus 1 by morning. Wind chill minus 9 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Sunday 12 February 2023

entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High minus 1. POP 30%
entry.summary: Flurries ending in the morning then mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light late in the afternoon. High minus 1. Wind chill near minus 9. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Sunday 12 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 7 with temperature rising to minus 1 by morning.
